ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Epic 2.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Very little known about any of the Epic 2.0 quests.  Mostly rumor and conjecture.  IMO SoE hasn t worked them out yet, either the quests or even the rewards.
ygData.messageBody:
Very little known about any of the Epic 2.0 quests. Mostly rumor and
conjecture. IMO SoE hasn't worked them out yet, either the quests or even
the rewards.

Meleth
Tarew Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: "Pat Wikston" <lookingforasongtoplay@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 2004 6:23 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Epic 2.0


> I have been looking for infomation reguarding the new Bard Epic that is
goin to be released with EQ's new Expansion OOW: and I have not been able to
find anything at all about this. I am wondering if any of you guys have been
looking up the information and have been able to find something that is
worth passing on ?!
>
> Argill
> Xegony
>
